item.title: De-Tabifying
item.description: There is probably no more boring task in programming that processing a file to replace tabs with spaces or doing the reverse and replacing spaces with tabs. And yet it has started religious wars that have raged for years in various programming communities. This “tabifying” or “de-tabifying” is not something I have to do frequently, but every once in a while, I need to convert tabs to spaces in some text.
